hjz_zork

Class Dungeon

  • java.lang.Object
    • hjz_zork.Dungeon

  • class Dungeon
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the Zork dungeon.
    Version:
    1.0, 11/15/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Character> characters
      A HashMap of the characters in this Dungeon.
      private Room entry
      The room that serves as the entrance to this Dungeon.
      private java.lang.String filename
      The name of the dungeon (.bork or .zork) file used to create this Dungeon.

      A HashMap of the items in this Dungeon.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of this Dungeon.
      private PantSuitTroll nemesis
      The Character that serves as the nemesis of the adventurer.
      private Adventurer player
      The Character that represents the player.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Room> rooms
      A HashMap of the rooms in this Dungeon.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Troll> trolls
      A HashMap of the trolls in this Dungeon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dungeon

        Dungeon(java.lang.String filename,
        boolean init)
 throws java.text.ParseException
        Constructor for Dungeon class.
        Parameters:
        filename - The dungeon (.bork or .zork) file to create this Dungeon from.
        init - Flag for if this Dungeon's state should be initialized like new.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If filename cannot be parsed.
